caption.p: (A) 2D and (B) 3D AFM images and contour map (C) of a single SARS-CoV virion. Scale bar = 100 nm in (A) and (C). The corresponding cursor profiles (middle and bottom row) provide quantitative measurements of the dimensions for the spike proteins (1â€“15) displayed in (C).
